title: Roster Screen - Renders Non Roster Invitees *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps: When the user switches to the NRI tab via the segmented tab
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to view the Non-Roster Invitees list

title: Team Roster > NRI Tab > Messaging *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps: When the user is on the NRI tab
custom_expected: Then there will be messaging at the top of the view explaining what the NRI tab is

title: Team Roster Displays *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is on a Team Page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Roster button from the [Team] Info section
custom_expected: Then the corresponding team's roster view will load

title: Team Roster > Top Header *
custom_preconds: Given the user has the MLB app installed
custom_steps: When the user views the top header of a Team Roster
custom_expected:
-Back button (Returning you to Team Page)
-Segmented Controller to choose: Active | 40-Man | NRI
-Sort button

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps: When the user switches to the 40-Man tab via the segmented tab
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to view the 40-Man Roster

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab > Key *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man tab
and views the bottom of the roster page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a key indicating:
* Not on Active Roster
** Not on 40-man Roster

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab > Disabled List (DL) ***
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man roster tab
and a player is on the DL
custom_expected:
Then user will still see the player on the 40-man Roster view
and will see a ** by players name
and see a 60-day DL label

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab > Active Roster ***
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man roster tab
and a player is on the Active roster
custom_expected:
The user will see the player on the 40-man Roster view
and will see a * by the players name

title: Team Roster > Positional Groupings
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Roster view
and has sorted by Position
and views the positional groupings
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following order:
Pitchers
Catchers
Infield
Outfield
Designated Hitter (if applicable)

title: Team Roster > Positional Groupings > Infield
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Roster view
and has sorted by Position
and views the positional groupings
and looks at the Infield
custom_expected:
Then the infielders will be listed in the following order:

1B
2B
3B
SS

title: Team roster > Positional Groupings > Outfield
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Roster view
and has sorted by Position
and views the positional groupings
and looks at the Outfield
custom_expected:
Then the outfielders will be listed in the following order:

LF
CF
RF

title: Team Roster > Player Cards *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps: When the user taps on a player name
custom_expected: Then the player page will open

title: Team Roster > Player Default Headshot
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a player on the Roster view
who does not have a headshot
custom_expected: Then the default headshot will be displayed

title: Team Roster > Sort Button *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps: When the user taps the Sort button
custom_expected:
-The header 'Sort roster by'
-Alphabetical button
-Position button
-Number button
-Cancel button

title: Team Roster > Dismissing Sort Button *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user has launched the Sort menu
and taps on the "Cancel" button
custom_expected:
Then the action sheet is dismissed
and the previous sort results are displayed

title: Team Roster > Active Tab > Alphabetical *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Active tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Alphabetical
custom_expected: Then the Active roster will be listed in Alphabetical order

title: Team Roster > Active Tab > Position
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Active tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Position
custom_expected: Then the Active roster will be listed and grouped by Position

title: Team Roster > Active Tab > Player Number *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the Active tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Number
custom_expected: Then the Active roster will be listed in Numerical order by jersey numbers

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab > Alphabetical *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Alphabetical
custom_expected: Then the 40-Man roster will be listed in Alphabetical order

title: Team Roster > 40-Man Tab > Position *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Position
custom_expected: Then the 40-Man roster will be listed and grouped by Position

title: Team Roster > 40-Man > Player Number *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the 40-Man tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Number
custom_expected: Then the 40-Man roster will be listed in Numerical order by jersey numbers

title: Team Roster > NRI Tab > Alphabetical *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the NRI tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Alphabetical
custom_expected: Then the NRI roster will be listed in Alphabetical order

title: Team Roster > NRI Tab > Position *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the NRI tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Position
custom_expected: Then the NRI roster will be listed and grouped by Position

title: Team Roster > NRI Tab > Player Number *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When the user is on the NRI tab
and taps on the Sort button
and taps on Number
custom_expected: Then the NRI roster will be listed in Numerical order by jersey numbers

title: Team Roster > Last Used Filter *
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the MLB app installed
and the user is viewing a Team Roster
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Roster view
and changes filters
and leaves the view and comes back
custom_expected: Then the user will see the last used position/alpha filter
